#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	else
	return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	long long int test,n,m,x,y,z;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m;
		long long int nod1,nod2,noe1,noe2;
		if(n%2==1)
		{
			nod1=n/2+1;
			noe1=n/2;
		}
		else
		{
			nod1=n/2;
			noe1=n/2;
		}
		if(m%2==1)
		{
			nod2=m/2+1;
			noe2=m/2;
		}
		else
		{
			nod2=m/2;
			noe2=m/2;
		}
		x=(nod1*noe2)+(nod2*noe1);
		y=n*m;
		//cout<<nod1<<" "<<noe2<<" "<<nod2<<" "<<noe1<<"\n";
		z=gcd(x,y);
		cout<<x/z<<"/"<<y/z<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
